title: Congrats Gearóid
text: Massive congratulations to soon-to-be Dr. Gearóid Manning, who completed his PhD viva on Friday!

title: New group website launched
text: We are happy to announce our new group website. Check out our research, publications and group members!

title: C4C-Capture project officially launched
text: The EPA-funded C4C-Capture project has begun, focusing on biomass- and biowaste-derived carbon materials for DAC.
